channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description: cannot find the path specified almost every source compiler file says that .

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Rshahine:

Enviromnt variables ~ you should change them

Err no…

Right Click + Edit your Run.bat

you will see something similar to this;

@echo off
title Server Runner
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar emily.rs2hd.Main
pause

(Don’t use my code, still use yours)
Ok now replace this part

C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe

(in your compiler) to your Jre6 File Directory to Java.exe (since jre is used for running, JDK is used for compiling)

Edit:
Whoops you said Compiler, ok, right click + edit your Compiler.bat (what ever it’s called)
you will see something similar to this;

@echo off
title Server Compiler
echo Compiling core...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/emily/rs2hd/Main.java
pause

Change this

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac
(in your code), to your JDK file directory (jdk-bin-javac)

Read full topic
